channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Reconstruction of D.C.'s Black Lives Matter Plaza to begin next week
item.description: Work to alter D.C.'s Black Lives Matter Plaza on 16th Street NW will begin Monday, with that phrase expected to be removed.

item.title: FEMA cancels classes at national fire training academy amid federal funding cuts
item.description: "It’s not a ‘nice to have.’ It is the one avenue we have to bring people from all over the country to learn from and with each other."

item.title: ChatGPT gets ‘anxiety’ from violent user inputs, so researchers are teaching the chatbot mindfulness techniques to ‘soothe’ it
item.description: A study on how to “calm down” chatbots could advance how AI is applied in mental health interventions, according to the authors.

item.title: The Smartest Thing I Ever Did: Women on Life-Changing Decisions
